channel.title: Making spec

item.title: Making spec
item.dc:creator: @drakeman drakeman
item.description:
@drakeman wrote:

do i have to make something like this to change the amount of atks in spec? if so, where do i change it so its 4 atks in 1 spec

public void hally() {
if (IsAttackingNPC && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 3204) {
setAnimation(440);
actionTimer = 4;
SpecDamgNPC(30);
DDS2Damg = true;
DDStimer = 1;
resetAnimation();
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
SpecDamgNPC(30);
SpecialDelay -= 1;
} else if (IsAttacking && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 3204) {
int j = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX;
int k = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY;
int l = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].playerLevel[playerHitpoints];

        SpecDamg(30);
        DDS2Damg = true;
        DDStimer = 1;
        startAnimation(440);
        actionTimer = 4;
        teleportToX = absX;
        teleportToY = absY;
        SpecialDelay -= 1;
    }
}

Read full topic
